column4: What is the easiest way for me to fix this "System timer resolution is too low - Rosegarden was unable to find a high-resolution timing source for MIDI performance." Can anyone help?
What is the easiest way to change my system timer resolution?
that doesn't seem to be a common problem, please look at the documentation for rosegarden thoroughly
It's a very common problem. It's because old linux kernels used 1000Mhz timer or something and the newer kernels use 250Mhz timer... I am looking for an easy way to fix this
